同行者(訪日): パートナー(恋人・夫婦など)
訪問目的(沖縄県)ALL: 花見などの自然鑑賞,アウトドア:ビーチ・海水浴,アウトドア:登山・トレッキング
情報収集(沖縄県)_ALL: 航空会社ホームページ,口コミサイト(Tripadvisor等),Google Mapなどの地図アプリやサイトでの検索
訪問目的(やんばるエリア)ALL: 花見などの自然鑑賞,アウトドア:ビーチ・海水浴,アウトドア:登山・トレッキング
同行者(やんばるエリア): パートナー(恋人・夫婦など)
情報収集(やんばるエリア)_ALL: Google Mapなどの地図アプリやサイトでの検索,旅行ガイドブック,自国の親戚・知人,日本在住の親族・知人
やんばるエリア内での交通手段の満足度の理由: Respect of the traffic rules by locals is poor. For exemple nobody stops at the pedestrian crossing to let people cross the road. Too much traffic because public transport options are very poor. The highway buses are good, but even then different companies operate almost at the same times instead of distributing the buses better throughout the day. It often looks as nobody really thinks and use common sense before making decisions or regulations.
体験・サービス満足度の理由(やんばるエリア): Okinawa is targeting cheap, massive and low education tourism. On such a small iwith limited and fragile natural resources, it is sad that immediate money takes over long term, sustainable development. There is a huge potential, but it seems there is no vision from decision makers (destruction of the forest and nature everywhere, old buildings and electric lines everywhere like in a developing country…
推奨項目(やんばるエリア): I live Yanbaru and I really hope local decision makers will wake up before they completely destroy the treasure they are living on. A simple example is the issue with the roadkills in the north. It would be so simple to place speed bumps to lower the speed of cars in the dangerous areas or even fixed radars (it would surely create some good income). Yet, when talking about it even with the staff of the nature center, the answer is just excuses and putting the responsibility on various ministries.
改善点の内容(やんばるエリア): See my previous comments: basically targeting cheap massive tourism is not sustainable and actually destroying the tourism experience. Low consideration for nature protection and education, low education of the local people. Old buildings and facilities, lack of attractive urban areas (terraces to eat outdoor, food trucks in the 21st century park for example. So many people pass via motobu town to go to the aquarium, but the town does not encourage to stop and stay there overnight, or stop and est in a nice cafe or restaurant and do some shopping. Instead it looks like an old almost abandoned town that we need to cross as rapidly as possible to reach the aquarium.
